PageWidgetPortable.Title: Em inspeção
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_QL_ORDENSINSPECAO.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>(A.STATUS=2) AND (A.GRUPOINSPECAO IN (SELECT D.HANDLE FROM QL_GRUPOSINSPECAO D WHERE D.HANDLE IN (SELECT E.GRUPOINSPECAO FROM QL_INSPECIONADORES E WHERE E.USUARIO = @USUARIO)))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t2081_at2535_hs67f280f7.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
